title: Shekhar Home
overview: Set in 1990s Lonpur, Bengal, “Shekhar Home” combines suspense & comedy as eccentric Shekhar and his new housemate Jayavrat solve a variety of cases while interacting with a vibrant cast of characters in a charming, pre-technology era.

tv.episodeOverview: Shekhar & Jayavrat are in Bihar for a blackmail scandal involving a famous politician. Shekhar is fascinated by the enigmatic Iraboty, while Mrinmoy discovers a classified file on "M," adding a new layer of intrigue to their investigation.
